page.title: 14Churchgate St The Postmaster
page.content:
The{Post Office}is combined with a general store which provides for most daily needs.
{Mr and Mrs Cowper}have been at the Post Office for two months, but they have lived in the area for two and a half years. They help invalids with their shopping and do deliveries, mostly to the old who use the shop as a base for help or company.
The{Post Office}deals with stamps, about 350 parcels per week, pensions, family allowances, Giro accounts, bills and registered letters.
{Unusual visitors}are the horses from the nearby stables who pop their heads through the door for carrots when the stable girls come shopping.
